Server.Name: Wild West Mod (V1)
Server.Description:
The Wild West Mod takes you back to the mid 19th Century American Wild West.
Features Include: - Unique Hand Crafted World by Tallman Brad - Exclusive Wild West POIs by Community Creators - Custom Weapons and Tools by Oakraven - Custom Entities by Oakraven - Rideable Horses by Oakraven - Custom Vehicles by Oakraven - Immersive Quests - Custom Traps for Defense and Fishing by Oakraven - Challenging Dynamic Weather - Decorative Spawning Loot Opportunities - Sustainable Farming and Animal Husbandry by Oakraven - and a great deal more...
